msg: - Added fixed bug message for bug 7640 "createTransformation aspect ratio scaling", since I missed to add it in the commit message there (didn't know it was officially reported).

msg: - Fixed unreported bug of Imagemagick filters not maintaining aspect ratio when scaling width and height.
